title: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar
description: Bug 7945: Search results are not being selected in external jar. Build 200201151. When searching for references to this field, the expected behavior is to get 3 matches in the method getTempDir().
OB: Currently, the observed behavior is not mentioned in the bug report.
EB: The expected behavior is to get 3 matches in the method getTempDir().
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Make sure you have JDK1.3.1 as the default JRE (and that you have source for rt.jar).
2. Open java.io.File.
3. Select the field 'tmpFir'.
